PD_PULSELOW.message: Setting pulser board into dynamic mode, please tune the PULL DOWN VOLTAGE to [0.94V] and turn SIPM HIGH VOLTAGE [ON]

PD_PULSEHI.message: Setting pulser board into dynamic mode, please tune the PULL DOWN VOLTAGE to [1.65V] and turn SIPM HIGH VOLTAGE [ON]

PD_CONST.message: Setting pulser board into continuous mode, please tune the PULL DOWN VOLTAGE to [4.30V] and turn SIPM HIGH VOLTAGE [OFF]

PD_OFF.message: Turning off the pulser board, please tune the PULL DOWN VOLTAGE to [0] and turn SIPM HIGH VOLTAGE [OFF]

VIS_MODE.message: Preparing for visual calibration, please make sure the SIPM HIGH VOLTAGE is [OFF]

DARK_MODE.message: Preparing for data collections, please make sure that the LIGHT SENSING POWER is [ON]

ND_FILTER0.message: Add ND FILTER index [0] to the gantry system. Turn SIPM HIGH VOLTAGE [OFF] during process.

ND_FILTER1.message: Add ND FILTER index [1] to the gantry system. Turn SIPM HIGH VOLTAGE [OFF] during process.
